A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many unanswered questions and no real character development for Rey and Finn compared to The Force Awakens. I was disappointed by the many plot holes and some of the choices they made for the story. I still enjoyed the film overall and didn’t find myself bored. But this honestly felt like it could have been Episode 7 1/2 waiting to get to 8 which would really be proper. Desperately hoping IX will make up for this.
